column1: #: description: Inclusive J/$\psi$ $R_{\rm AA}$ and Pb-Pb yields as a function of $p_{\rm T}$ for the 0-20% centrality class and $2.5<y<4.0$. Statistical and systematic uncertainties are also reported. A global systematic uncertainty of 8% (4%) affects all the $R_{\rm AA}$ (yields) values.
#: keyword reactions: PB PB --> J/PSI X
#: keyword phrases: Inclusive | Double Differential Distribution | Transverse Momentum Dependence | Rapidity Dependence
